DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacologic treatment remain primary therapeutic approach fibromyalgia management , different non-pharmacologic measure , especially physical therapy psychologically-based intervention , also show effective treatment disease . The objective present randomize control trial compare efficacy tolerability two different modality active low-impact exercise warm water : stretching Ai Chi . Each group patient receive 18 physiotherapy session last 60 minute evaluate baseline , treatment termination , 4 12 week follow . Main outcome measure Fibromyalgia Impact Questionnaire ( FIQ ) Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) . Secondary outcome measure include Beck Depression Inventory ( BDI ) , State Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , SF-12 Health Survey ( SF-12 . Data analysis do use repeated measure ANOVA , unpaired Student 's test , effect size ' estimation ( ES ) .
